Package io.openems.edge.core.appmanager.formly.builder

Class InputBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.openems.edge.core.appmanager.formly.builder.FormlyBuilder<InputBuilder>
io.openems.edge.core.appmanager.formly.builder.InputBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnlyIf<InputBuilder>, Self<InputBuilder>
public final class InputBuilder extends FormlyBuilder<InputBuilder>
A Builder for a Formly Input. 
 {
        "key": "key",
        "type": "input",
        "templateOptions": {
                "type": "number",
                "label": "label",
                "placeholder": "placeholder",
                "required": true,
                "min": 0,
                "max": 100,
                "minLenght": 6,
                "maxLenght": 18,
                "pattern": /(\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}/
        },
        "validation": {
                "messages": {
                        "pattern": "Input is not a valid IP Address!",
                },
        },
        "expressionProperties": {
                "templateOptions.required": "model.PROPERTY"
        },
        "hideExpression": "!model.PROPERTY",
        "defaultValue": "defaultValue"
 }

    • setValidation

      public InputBuilder setValidation(Validation validation)

      e. g. to set the validation of an IP use Validation.IP

    • onlyPositiveNumbers

      public InputBuilder onlyPositiveNumbers()
      Only allows positive number as a input.
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if this InputBuilder has not been set to a InputType.NUMBER input via the InputBuildersetInputType(InputType) method.
